ygData.subject: Re: [The EverQuest Tavern] Leaving Private Guild Channel Help
ygData.msgSnippet: if its there when you login it must be in your autojoin,  to remove it simple type /autojoin to clear the list,  be sure to set default chat back to /say or
ygData.messageBody:
if its there when you login it must be in your
autojoin, to remove it simple type /autojoin to clear
the list, be sure to set default chat back to /say or
/ooc or whatever you would like it to be. What server
are you on ill see what i can dig up about guilds.

Chris




--- Mari <magickal_mari@...> wrote:
> I need to know what the command is to Permantly
> leave a Private Guild
> Channel. I have tried /leaveall but when I log back
> in the channel is
> there again. Nothing I have tried in game from GM
> has worked. I can't
> even speak to NPCs because everything I say goes
> directly into the
> channel because I Auto Joined this channel. I can
> speak /ooc but that
> is it. There has to be some kind of command for this
> other than going
> into my EQ comp files. Anyone have any GOOD Guild
> URLs with this type
> of info?
>
> Thanks
>
> Mari
>
>
